member.name: M:AutoprefixerHost.Extensions.StringExtensions.TryGetChar(System.String,System.Int32,System.Char@)
member.summary: Gets a character at the specified index from the string. A return value indicates whether the receiving succeeded.
member.param: The zero-based index of the character
When this method returns, contains the character from the string, if the receiving succeeded, or null character if the receiving failed. The receiving fails if the index out of bounds.
member.returns: true if the character was received successfully; otherwise, false
